mapper.select: /* file : ConsultingMapper.xml, id : getConsulting */ SELECT A.* , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , C1.NAME as C1_NAME , C2.NAME as C2_NAME , C3.NAME as C3_NAME FROM ST_CONSULTING A LEFT JOIN ST_CATEGORY1 AS C1 ON C1.CATEGORY1_SEQ = A.CATEGORY_1 LEFT JOIN ST_CATEGORY2 AS C2 ON C2.CATEGORY2_SEQ = A.CATEGORY_2 LEFT JOIN ST_CATEGORY3 AS C3 ON C3.CATEGORY3_SEQ = A.CATEGORY_3 WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND A.CON_SEQ = #{conSeq}
